none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on April 25, 2022 Description from Terminal Escape:
 I'm just gonna do it again - another post for folks who somehow missed history while it was happening. LOSE LOSE came and went in 2016, and left us with one monstrous recording - Kill Or Be Killed. Think about it: drums (FY FAN), guitar/vocals (DEATHREAT, TRAGEDY), bass (COLDBRINGER, WILD MOHICANS, CALL THE POLICE), and they blow it up by stripping everything to the bone. North American hardcore for the modern disillusionment moment. KILL OR BE KILLED
https://loselose.bandcamp.com/releases

seo.title: Lose Lose - Lose Lose - Terminal Escape
